wf_workflow.description: This is the workflow for GCP certificate approval
wf_workflow.name: gcp certificate approval workflow

sys_variable_value.value: approval_action=^stage=Accepted^EQ

Dear ${employee_name}; Your GCP certificate has been reviewed and accepted by your supervisor / project officer. You may login to the Good Clinical Practice application to see the detail.

wf_activity.name: Send Email to Manager for approval

sys_variable_value.value: Dear ${manager}, The GCP certificate for ${employee_name} has been submitted to you for review, please login to Good Clinical Practice application to review the document. If you have any question, please contact NCI GCP Web Admin
ACTION NEEDED Please review GCP Certificate for your staff
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer=current.manager_id;
ACTION NEEDED Please review GCP Certificate for your staff
